product_name: The Dixie Cragger's Atlas: Climber's Guide to Tennessee - Volume I
long_description: . Author: Chris Watford. Softcover, 320 pages. Market Place Press; copyright 2013. . Provides hundreds of new routes in existing areas and clear, concise descriptions.
short_description: The Dixie Cragger's Atlas: Climber's Guide to Tennessee offers comprehensive information on the best climbing in the state. Volume I includes climbs around metro Chattanooga.
